item.content:encoded: Image: Nintendo EPD, Eighting/Nintendo Keep the good vibes going ‚ÄúCozy games‚Äù are a huge phenomenon right now, because at the end of the day, who doesn‚Äôt like being cozy? item.description: Image: Valve Some of our favorite games are discounted on Steam through July 11 Steam has kicked off its annual Summer Sale, and is offering awesome discounts on a number of new releases and other e...
item.content:encoded: Image: Valve Some of our favorite games are discounted on Steam through July 11 Steam has kicked off its annual Summer Sale, and is offering awesome discounts on a number of new releases and other essential titles through July. You can even get a 15% discount on the 64 GB and 256 GB versions of the original Steam Deck. While there are literally hundreds of games on sale, we‚Äôve picked out a handful of recommendations that we think you should check out, many of which are, coincidentally, Steam D...

item.title: You‚Äôve only got 6 months left to buy the best Forza Horizon game | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Playground Games/Xbox Game Studios Forza Horizon 4, a love letter to British landscapes and car culture, is being delisted Playground Games and Microsoft have announced that Forza Horizon 4 w...
item.content:encoded: Image: Playground Games/Xbox Game Studios Forza Horizon 4, a love letter to British landscapes and car culture, is being delisted Playground Games and Microsoft have announced that Forza Horizon 4 will be delisted on Dec. 15. From then on, the 2018 open-world racing game and its additional content will no longer be available for purchase from the Xbox Store, the Microsoft Store, or Steam, and it‚Äôll be removed from Game Pass. It will remain playable for people who own a digital or physical copy...

item.title: Xbox games will soon be playable via your Amazon Fire TV Stick | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Photo: Thomas Trutschel/Photothek via Getty Images No console, just cloud Microsoft and Amazon have announced a cloud gaming partnership starting in July that lets users with select Amazon Fire TV S...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Thomas Trutschel/Photothek via Getty Images No console, just cloud Microsoft and Amazon have announced a cloud gaming partnership starting in July that lets users with select Amazon Fire TV Sticks play Xbox games without a console. Instead, users can download the Xbox app on their Fire TV device, log in to their Microsoft account, and start playing right away ‚Äî all without an Xbox console being necessary. If you don‚Äôt own an Amazon Fire TV Stick, rest assured it‚Äôs cheaper than an Xbox w...

item.title: Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree reaches 5M players in first week | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco That‚Äôs about one-fifth of all Elden Ring players Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree sold 5 million units in its first three days of availability, publisher Bandai Nam...
item.content:encoded: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco That‚Äôs about one-fifth of all Elden Ring players Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree sold 5 million units in its first three days of availability, publisher Bandai Namco announced Thursday, an impressive figure that equates to about one-fifth of the original game‚Äôs overall fanbase. Bandai Namco and developer FromSoftware announced in June, nine days ahead of the DLC‚Äôs launch, that Elden Ring had sold 25 million copies since its release in February 2022. (It was t...

item.title: Even Torrent is scared of the new Elden Ring DLC | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco via Polygon Poor baby! There is nothing better than a trusty steed. Every adventurer needs a creature who can ride into the depths of hell and back and serve as a con...
item.content:encoded: Image: FromSoftware/Bandai Namco via Polygon Poor baby! There is nothing better than a trusty steed. Every adventurer needs a creature who can ride into the depths of hell and back and serve as a constant source of support throughout the trials and tribulations of becoming a hero. But as the new Elden Ring: Shadow of the Erdtree DLC reminds us, every creature has its limits. And now even Torrent ‚Äî the ride-or-die horsey of the Tarnished ‚Äî can‚Äôt take it anymore, and he won‚Äôt be summoned in a par...
